title: val(bam_file) -> file(bam_file)
body:
I think each instance of `val(bam_file)` in `generate-vcf/main.nf` should be `file(bam_file)` otherwise the process does not work under singularity.

I have fixed locally so this is not urgent

title: Staging problem using singularity with combine-gvcfs
body:
I had some problems with the combine-gvcfs using singularity because the file that is staged is the _list_ of gvcfs rather than the gvcfs.

My suggestion is to have parameter --gvcf_dir which contains (perhaps nested) all the gvcfs. The sampelsheet should then have file names that are relative to this.

title: Mitochondrial variant calling pipeline missing a step
body:
Hi @grbot 

I see that the mitochondrial variant calling pipeline excluded "Align the unmapped BAM file with the reference aligned BAM and shifted reference aligned BAM" step described in [mt-variant calling gatk pipeline](https://gatk.broadinstitute.org/hc/en-us/articles/4403870837275-Mitochondrial-short-variant-discovery-SNVs-Indels-). Any particular reason for that. I am asking this because I don't understand this step either and was wondering if this is really necessary ?

I can see shifted reference fasta available [here](https://github.com/broadinstitute/gatk/blob/master/scripts/mitochondria_m2_wdl/ExampleInputsMitochondriaPipeline.json)
